SCI_FI - Static variable in class jsoul.midi.Instrument
 
SEASHORE - Static variable in class jsoul.midi.Instrument
 
Sequence - Class in jsoul.midi
Represents a MIDI sequence, comprised of several layered Tracks, each containing some subsequence of notes and chords.
Sequence() - Constructor for class jsoul.midi.Sequence
Default constructor.
Sequence(Track...) - Constructor for class jsoul.midi.Sequence
Constructs a new sequence by layering the provided Tracks, at 120 BPM.
set(int, Playable) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Track
Set the Note or Chord at a certain location in the track.
setDuration(int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Chord
Sets the duration of the chord.
setDuration(int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Note
Sets the duration of the note, in midi ticks, where 1 tick is a 16th of a beat.
setFileName(String) - Method in class jsoul.midi.MidiFile
Set the desired file name of the MIDI file.
setInstrument(int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Instrument
Sets the instrument value for this instrument
setInstrument(Instrument) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Track
Sets the track's instrument using an Instrument object.
setInstrument(int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Track
Sets the track's instrument using the instrument's MIDI value (0-127).
setNote(int, int, int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Note
Sets the properties of the Note, similar to the corresponding constructor.
setNote(String, int, int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Note
Sets the properties of the Note, similar to the corresponding constructor.
setPitch(int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Note
Sets the Note's pitch.
setPitch(String) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Note
Sets the Note's pitch
setPitches(int[]) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Chord
Set the pitches to a new set of values.
setTempoInBPM(float) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Sequence
Sets the tempo of the sequence, in beats per minute.
setTrack(int, Track) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Sequence
Sets a particular track in the Sequence.
setTracks(Track...) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Sequence
Reset all tracks in the sequence.
setVelocity(int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Chord
Set the velocity (volume) of the chord.
setVelocity(int) - Method in class jsoul.midi.Note
Sets the velocity value of the note (0-127)

SIXTEENTH - Static variable in class jsoul.midi.Note
The midi duration of a sixteenth note, measured in ticks, where 1 tick is assumed to be one 16th of a beat.
SIXTYFOURTH - Static variable in class jsoul.midi.Note
The midi duration of a 64th note, measured in ticks, where 1 tick is assumed to be one 16th of a beat.
